p: The cities with the highest EV71-positive rates were not the same during each large epidemic. For example, in 2010, high EV71-positive rates were found in Beihai, Yulin, and Guigang, whereas in 2012, the highest rates were in Hechi and Laibin, with Qinzhou and Nanning having the highest rates in 2014 ( Fig 6). Cities with the highest EV71 prevalence also alternated during each small epidemic. In 2011, high EV71-positive rates were noted in Laibin and Guigang, which are located in the middle of Guangxi. In 2013, EV71-positive rates for all 14 cites were relatively low (under 25%). In 2015, a high EV71-positive rate was noted in Chongzuo, a western city in Guangxi.
